lead_paragraph: City officials decided to use stimulus money to pay for the construction of a garage at St. Barnabas Hospital, but a union argued that the project should not qualify for the money.
snippet: City officials decided to use stimulus money to pay for the construction of a garage at St. Barnabas Hospital, but a union argued that the project should not qualify for the money.

headline.main: Parking Lot Is a Battleground for a Bronx Hospital and a Doctors Union
headline.seo: Parking Lot Causes Rift for St. Barnabas and Union
headline.print_headline: Parking Lot Is a Battleground for a Bronx Hospital and a Doctors Union
